# Next.js Portfolio Project Setup

- [x] Create project instructions file

- [x] Scaffold Next.js project

- [x] Test and compile

## Project Details
- **Type**: Next.js Portfolio Website
- **Owner**: Saad Karzouz
- **Purpose**: AI & Data Science Engineer Portfolio for Vercel deployment
- **Tech Stack**: Next.js 15, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion

## ✅ Project Complete!

Your portfolio is ready! The development server is running at http://localhost:3000

### Next Steps:

1. **View Your Portfolio**: Open http://localhost:3000 in your browser
2. **Customize Content**: Edit the components in `src/components/` to personalize
3. **Deploy to Vercel**:
   - Push to GitHub: `git init`, `git add .`, `git commit -m "Initial commit"`
   - Go to https://vercel.com and import your repository
   - Click Deploy - Vercel will automatically detect Next.js settings

### Key Features:
✓ Responsive design works on all devices
✓ Smooth animations with Framer Motion
✓ SEO optimized with proper meta tags
✓ Fast performance with Next.js 15
✓ All sections from your CV included
✓ Professional dark theme with gradient accents
